summary: The woman in this video is a member of the Aura Bloom VIP Crystal Club and is showing off the crystal she received this month. She decided to use the crystal as a bag charm for her Dragon Diffusion bag and explains that the bag is handmade in India by a sustainably made factory.

categories.name: visual_quality
categories.feedback: The visual quality is good, but the lighting could be improved. The background is a bit cluttered.

categories.name: audio_quality
categories.feedback: The audio quality is decent, but there is some background noise. The speaker's voice is clear and easy to understand.

categories.name: content_engagement
categories.feedback: The content is engaging, but the speaker could be more enthusiastic. The video is informative and provides useful information about the crystal and bag.

categories.name: brand_mention
categories.feedback: The video mentions both Aura Bloom and Dragon Diffusion, which is great for brand awareness. The speaker provides a positive review of both brands.

categories.name: use_case_demonstration
categories.feedback: The video demonstrates how to use the crystal as a bag charm, which is helpful for viewers. The speaker provides clear instructions and shows the finished product.

recommendations: Consider adding some B-roll footage of the crystal and bag so that viewers can see them more clearly.
Try to speak more clearly and slowly so that viewers can understand you better.
If you have other bag charms, show them off to give viewers more ideas for how to style their bags.
transcript: Hey, I'm part of this is Aura Bloom VIP Crystal Club. I get a free crystal every month. This is what came for me. It's not really my style, but I thought my everyday bag is looking a little naked and maybe I could use it as like a bag charm situation. So I was like, what if I just like take it and kind of wrap it around like that? Put it right there. What do we think? Okay. So she's wrapped. This is a little abalone shell. You can see it up close. It's not a necklace that I would wear and I feel like the black cord just kind of blends in with the bag. So now how cutie pie is she? I love it. I want to put more bag charms on her and I feel like this is like such my vibe. Like I love crystals and things. I'm glad I get to use this in a more unconventional way. Also, I always get a ton of questions about my bag, where my bag is from, all things. This is a Dragon Diffusion bag. They're all made to order handmade in India in um sustainably made factories, well-paid fair wage payment, everything like that. And they're extremely, extremely well made. Um like I open the package, I could like smell the leather. I can still smell it. Um and just a little fun fact. You look inside the bag. There's a St. Christopher's charm, which it I believe is like a traveler's protector protection charm. So super cool and you should check them out.
